other_tests.findings: Neurofibromatous change with elements of giant cell fibroblastoma.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The patient returned 3 years later with neurofibroma-related gynecomastia in the right breast.

other_tests.findings: Bilateral breast enlargement with tenderness on deep palpation.
Pathologic examination revealed neurofibromatosis of the left and right breast tissue.
Hyalinized collagenous stroma without ducts, consistent with pseudogynecomastia.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Follow-up examination 9 years later demonstrated progression of cutaneous lesions consistent with neurofibromatosis type I.

other_tests.findings: Pathologic examination revealed a neurofibroma of the right breast.
Pathologic examination revealed neurofibroma; S-100 stain negative.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The patient remained pain-free after excision.
